title: 使用video组件之后页面崩溃
body:
页面中用了video组件之后崩溃，
版本是v1.0.1-beta.5

chrome上报错如下：
Uncaught SyntaxError: Invalid regular expression: /^matrix3d\((?:[-\d.]+,\s*){12}([-\d.]+),\s*([-\d.]+)(?:,\s*[-\d.]+){2}\)/: Stack overflow
    at RegExp.exec (<anonymous>)
    at RegExp.[Symbol.match] (<anonymous>)
    at String.match (native)
    at getTransformOffset (http://localhost:12580/dist/browser.js:17027:30)
    at Scroll.refresh (http://localhost:12580/dist/browser.js:17828:30)
    at Scroll.init (http://localhost:12580/dist/browser.js:17700:12)
    at Scroller.create (http://localhost:12580/dist/browser.js:18179:19)
    at Scroller.create (http://localhost:12580/dist/browser.js:18527:46)
    at Scroller.Component (http://localhost:12580/dist/browser.js:15494:20)
    at Scroller.Scrollable (http://localhost:12580/dist/browser.js:18406:15)
